C

Client - Class in Aleksandrov.Chat
The main class of the client.
Client() - Constructor for class Aleksandrov.Chat.Client
 
Client.SocketThread - Class in Aleksandrov.Chat
 
clientConnected - Variable in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Client
Field-flag, it will be set to true if the client is connected to the server or false otherwise.
clientHandshake() - Method in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Client.SocketThread
Method in the loop, receives messages using the connection connection.
clientMainLoop() - Method in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Client.SocketThread
This method implements the main processing cycle of server messages.
close() - Method in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Connection
This method closes all existed streams
connection - Variable in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Client
 
Connection - Class in Aleksandrov.Chat
The Connection class will act as a wrapper over the class java.net.Socket, which will be able to serialize and deserialize objects type Message to the socket.
Connection(Socket) - Constructor for class Aleksandrov.Chat.Connection
constructor initialise sockets input and output streams
connectionMap - Static variable in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Server
map which stores all active connections
ConsoleHelper - Class in Aleksandrov.Chat
An additional class for reading or writing to the console
ConsoleHelper() - Constructor for class Aleksandrov.Chat.ConsoleHelper
